department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: Expanding the chancery at the Embassy of Canada in Doha to the State of Qatar
description: The government is seeking bids for Architectural & Engineering Services to expand the chancery at the Embassy of Canada in Doha to the State of Qatar. The project involves expanding the chancery to a total floor area of approximately 274 square meters of the 30th floor of the building, including additional workstations, washroom facilities, a meeting room, a new Head of Mission office, a waiting area, a wellness support room, a kitchenette, and a printer/business center. The chosen consultant will be responsible for producing all working drawings for the project.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Qualify for Architectural & Engineering Services

The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), invites qualified suppliers to express their interest in providing Architectural & Engineering (A&E) Services for the expansion of the Chancery of the Embassy of Canada in Doha, State of Qatar.

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: 23-221044
* Publication Date: September 8, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: September 23, 2022, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expiring

### Project Overview

The project involves the expansion of the Chancery located on the 30th floor of the Tornado Tower, Doha, State of Qatar. The scope of work includes:

* Additional workstations
* Additional washroom facilities
* VCNET meeting room
* New Head of Mission (HOM) office and waiting area
* Wellness support room
* Kitchenette
* Printer / Business Center

### Requirements

Respondents must be capable of providing the full range of A&E services required in English or French and have the ability to participate in on-site project activities in the State of Qatar. The chosen Consultant will be responsible for producing all working drawings and will be required to stamp them with a licensed architect and a licensed engineer.

### Prequalification Requirements

Interested suppliers must respond to this Request for Qualification (RFQ) to be considered for the prequalification process. Only those Respondents meeting the prequalification requirements as defined in this document will be invited to submit competitive bids during the Request for Proposal (RFP) phase of the solicitation.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Brent Hygaard, 
Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca), 
Phone: 343-203-1331

Supporting documents can be accessed through the following links:

* RFQ document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/9ef11ecccac762c2ee3ccb9dacc21d0a/23-221044_qa_1.pdf
* Addendum 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/
